channel.title: Comments on: Arduino FIO Internal Voltmeter and Thermometer
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: patrick fairclough
item.dc:creator: patrick fairclough
item.description:
I see the unit stores the data for 8x8 second cycles, what is the maximum number of samples that could be used? I'm looking for something that we can use to measure the temperature of guillemot eggs in the wild. The idea being we come back once a week (or more frequently if required daily is possible) and upload the data, rather then being there all the time.
Thanks Patrick
item.content:encoded:
I see the unit stores the data for 8×8 second cycles, what is the maximum number of samples that could be used?
I’m looking for something that we can use to measure the temperature of guillemot eggs in the wild. The idea being we come back once a week (or more frequently if required daily is possible) and upload the data, rather then being there all the time.

Thanks
Patrick
